title: AlarmState (Enum)
text:
TYPE AlarmState :
This enumeration defines the possible states an alarm can have.

rows.Name: Active
rows.Comment: Alarm is active (alarm condition is true).

rows.Name: WaitingForConfirmation
rows.Comment: Alarm is no longer active, but has to be confirmed.

rows.Name: ActiveAcknowledged
rows.Comment: Alarm is still active, has to be acknowledged.

rows.Name: InactiveUnacknowledged
rows.Comment: Alarm is inactive, has to be acknowledged.

rows.Name: Pending
rows.Comment:
An state indicating, that the alarm condition is true, but the alarm
is not yet in the state âActiveâ
